Timelapse meets AI as Timescapes rakes in Series A millions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/timelapse-meets-ai-as-timescapes-rakes-in-series-a-millions/TJNV2KA4VBGQRJRCYI2XOWRYYM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/timelapse-meets-ai-as-timescapes-rakes-in-series-a-millions/TJNV2KA4VBGQRJRCYI2XOWRYYM/ Chris KeallChristchurch startup partners with North America's largest independent home builder. Sun, 10 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 As well as the usual build progress montage, Timescapes' timelapse photos can be used to track assets and people around a site, with AI analytics keeping track of head-count and how much gear is being used and when.
